problem.markdown:
>>The best estimate for the approximate total number of species on Earth, in millions is:<< () 2 () 5 (x) 10 () 20 () 100
[explanation]
There 2 million NAMED species on Earth. Although estimates vary, 10 million is the most common number for TOTAL species on Earth.
[explanation]
problem.p: The best estimate for the approximate total number of species on Earth, in millions is:

choicegroup.label: The best estimate for the approximate total number of species on Earth, in millions is:

div.p: There 2 million NAMED species on Earth. Although estimates vary, 10 million is the most common number for TOTAL species on Earth.
